name: AVVideoApertureMode
desc: A value that describes how a video is scaled or cropped.

items.name: static let cleanAperture: AVVideoApertureMode
items.desc: The pixel aspect ratio and clean aperture will be applied.

items.name: static let encodedPixels: AVVideoApertureMode
items.desc: The encoded dimensions of the image description are displayed.

items.name: static let productionAperture: AVVideoApertureMode
items.desc: The pixel aspect ratio will be applied.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a video aperture mode with a string.
